title: $1500 OFF SELECT UNITS !! Mountain views, Separate dining area
posting_body: ['Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', '-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity', '-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Onsite playground', '-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit', '-Mountain views', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
